title: Blog|记录 GitHub & Hexo 博客搭建过程
content:
Welcome! Today I’m going to share my experience of set up my own blog. Above all, you should get Hexo and a GitHub account prepared.欢迎！ 今天我将会分享我搭建个人博客的经历。首先，你需要准备好Hexo和一个GitHub账号。
……持续更新中……

title: Moxit's 破壳日！
content: Welcome to Moxit’s Blog! This is my very first post. If you get any problems when reading my blog, please contact the author by email MoxitNorotn@gmail.com. Thank you.欢迎来到Moxit’s Blog！这是我的第一篇Blog，如果您在阅读我的博客的过程中遇到任何问题，请通过邮箱联系我：MoxitNorton@gmail.com. 谢谢。

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
